title: Citrix security advisory (AV25-740)
description: On November 11, 2025, Citrix published a security advisory to address a vulnerability in the following products:
products: NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway 14.1  versions prior to 1-56.73
NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway 13.1  versions prior to 1-60.32
NetScaler ADC 13.1-FIPS and NDcPP  versions prior to 1-37.250-FIPS and NDcPP
NetScaler ADC 12.1-FIPS and NDcPP  versions prior to 1-55.333-FIPS and NDcPP
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
